bullets.title: Platform Architecture & Leadership
bullets.text: Led architecture and development of customer engagement platform serving 500k daily users using React, TypeScript, and Node.js microservices on AWS; mentored team of 3 engineers and established code review standards.

bullets.title: Performance Optimization
bullets.text: Reduced API response time by 60% through database query optimization and Redis caching implementation; improved page load speed by 40% using Next.js server-side rendering.

bullets.title: CI/CD & Infrastructure
bullets.text: Designed and implemented automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes with zero-downtime deployments.

bullets.title: Full-Stack Development
bullets.text: Built e-commerce checkout system processing $2M+ monthly revenue using React frontend and Django REST backend; integrated Stripe payments and implemented fraud detection.

bullets.title: Promotion & Team Collaboration
bullets.text: Promoted from Junior Engineer in 10 months after delivering critical features ahead of schedule; collaborated with product and design teams on roadmap planning and feature specifications.

bullets.title: Testing & Quality
bullets.text: Established comprehensive testing strategy with 85% code coverage using Jest and Pytest; implemented automated visual regression testing reducing production bugs by 50%.

bullets.title: Feature Development
bullets.text: Developed user authentication system and dashboard features using React, Redux, and Node.js; contributed to mobile app using React Native.

bullets.title: Database & API Design
bullets.text: Designed PostgreSQL database schema and RESTful APIs for content management system; implemented data migrations and optimization strategies.

bullets.title: Client Projects
bullets.text: Built responsive websites for 5+ clients using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress; managed project timelines and client communications.
